member.name: M:HunterIndustriesAPI.Controllers.TokenController.Post(HunterIndustriesAPI.Models.Requests.AuthenticationModel)
member.summary: Creates a bearer token.
member.remarks:
Sample Request:
POST /auth/token Authorization: Basic dXNlcm5hbWU6cGFzc3dvcmQ= Content-Type: application/json { "phrase": "Some wise words or something here." }
